1.text: Find a group of people interested in playing with you.

2.text: Select a player to be in charge of the game.

3.text: Have each player come up with a cool nickname.

4.text: Decide on the weapons players are allowed to use.

5.text: Agree on a play area where the game is to be played.

6.text: Determine whether or not the game has a time limit.

7.text: Set hours when the game is going to be put on pause.

8.text: Assign individual targets for each player or make it a free-for-all.

9.text: Designate a safe zone where kills cannot be scored.

10.text: Start the game once all players have agreed on the rules.

11.text: Earn 1 point for every agent you successfully hit with your weapon.

12.text: Say, “You’re dead” to declare that an opponent has been killed.

13.text: Get a new target once you take a player down.

14.text: Use social media to track the whereabouts of other players.

15.text: Form alliances with other agents if you want to pool resources.

16.text: Play until the last agent is left standing and tally up the points.

17.text: Change the rules for your game based on the environment and personal needs.

18.text: Use clothespins instead of weapons to avoid any misunderstandings.

19.text: Have a “no witnesses” rule to make the game more intense.

20.text: Establish awards for most kills, most creative assassination, and other achievements.
